name: Small Scale Farming
description: Small scale farming is the answer to ever growing population.Our 2 weeks long course offer the enthusisats to learn about this farming style and start on their own

name: Green Technology Education
description: This category is for those people who want to learn about green technology.We help business to initiate the journey of green tech.We have a world class education platform for training industrialists about green technology.

name: Asian Farmers Workshop
description: This special category is for empowering Asian farmers. Clime learn started its journey from Asia and hence, our mentors have a wide range of activities all over Asia just to educate the farmers and empower them.

name: Kindergarten Climate Education
description:
Our teachers offer perfect curriculum to teach the kindergarteners
        about environment and Climate.We have provided teachers all over
        the globe who designed the curriculum for each individual kid to
        teach about environment and Climate threats.

name: Plant Breeding
description: Plant breeding is the science of changing the traits of plants in order to produce desired characteristics.Plant breeders strive to create a specific outcome of plants and potentially new plant varieties, and in the course of doing so, narrow down the genetic diversity of that variety to a specific few biotypes.Our 1 month long ourse help you get started with your plant breeding journey
